issue.message: This HorizontalScrollView should use `android:layout_height="wrap_content"`

When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from com.bumptech.glide.request.target.NotificationTarget)

Attribute `android:foreground` has no effect on API levels lower than 23 (current min is 21)
Replace the <fragment> tag with FragmentContainerView.

Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `LogSender` which has field `ctx` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
